name: NOT EEL!
description:
Alright, here's the deal:

This funky lad wants to catch an eel.
Noone managed to catch any eels in ages, Some say they don't even live in these waters anymore. I can't tell you if there is any eel or not, but if the fisherman manages to catch other fish, he can sell them for money and buy a longer rope, with which he can search for eels further down.

use WASD to move the hook and try to catch fish.
If the fish start dodging your hook,
mabye you can find something that
 makes catching fish easier, who knows?

just be careful not to cast your hook too far down,
else the rope snaps and you cant reel it back up anymore.

Here is a quick chart of current fishmarket trade values:

Red SnapperBig & slow, easy to catch5 coinsSalmonBig  but fast, still rather easy to catch7 coinsBig TopperJust medium sized, despite its name9 coinsPirounderMedium in size, but can be pretty rough10 coinsFishcatMedium small, but rhumored to be rather intelligent10 coinsBitterlingSmall and difficult to catch. Tastes nice when fried15 coinsCatmouth YellowfishSmall and speedy, tough to catch but for a good pay20 coins
